artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Author: Poem by Sanseitei Mako
inscription: Hatsuhi-kage / nioteru haru ni / Ōmi no ya / Kagamino yama wo / mirumo mabayu ki, Sanseitei Mako 三星亭真湖 (New Year's morning glow / reflecting on the water / of Ōmi's lake. / Looking at Mirror Mountain, / now dazzing a scene! Sanseitei Mako)
medium: Woodblock print (surimono), ink and color on paper
portfolio: A Set of Horses (Uma zukushi 馬盡)
signed: Fusenkyo Iitsu hitsu 不染居為一筆
title: The Talisman
